wikipedia_page.main: Alexander Innes Shand (1832–1907) was a Scottish barrister and author, known as a journalist, critic, biographer, novelist and travel writer.

response: *Alexander Innes Shand. (1895). The Life of General Sir Edward Bruce Hamley, K.C.B., K.C.M.G. Edinburgh and London: W. Blackwood and Sons.
*Alexander Innes Shand, Brigadier General John Jacob C.B., Seeley and Co, London, 1900
* Alexander Innes Shand (1832–1907), Scottish barrister and author
* Pike and perch (with chapters by 'John Bickerdyke' [pseud.] and W. H. Pope, Cookery by Alexander Innes Shand; illustrated by George Roller and from photographs). London 1900
